item.title: [562] Zooming
item.dc:creator: @sportpirate sportpirate
item.description:
@sportpirate wrote:

These are very simple zooming configs i found

This goes in CommandPacketHandler.java

[CODE] if (cmd[0].equals(“zoomin”)) {
player.getActionSender().sendConfig(1241, 1);
}

			if (cmd[0].equals("zoomout")) {
			player.getActionSender().sendConfig(1241, 2);
			}[/CODE]

Note: these only work in resizable and fullscreen

Read full topic
